title: com.apple.controlcenter
description: ControlCenter settings for displaying the Bluetooth and WiFi menu bar items. Enable/Disable AirPlay Reciever ability

AirplayRecieverEnabled.title: Allow Airplay Receiver
AirplayRecieverEnabled.description: macOS 12 or Later. If set to false, restricts ability to AirPlay to Mac. (Yes, the key is actually spelled wrong).

Bluetooth.title: Display Bluetooth Status in Menu Bar
Bluetooth.description: macOS 12 or Later. If set to 18 will set the Bluetooth status to display in the Menu Bar. If set to 24 will remove the Bluetooth status from the Menu Bar

WiFi.title: Display WiFi Status in Menu Bar
WiFi.description: macOS 12 or Later. If set to 18 will set the WiFi status to display in the Menu Bar. If set to 24 will remove the Bluetooth status from the Menu Bar
